accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Karen Reuter Collection of Grady Lewis Papers #6328. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6328 P: Karen Reuter Collection of Grady Lewis Photographs

did.unittitle: Report to the President by the Emergency Board (no.68)

scopecontent.p: April 11, 1949. To investigate the facts as to disputes with respect to the manning of diesel electric locomotives. Bound volume.

did.unittitle: Transcript of Proceedings of the Emergency Board (no.68): Engineers' Diesel Case
Report to the President by the Emergency Board (no.70)

scopecontent.p: September 19, 1949. To investigate the facts and report its findings as to a dispute between the Carriers and the Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen. Bound volume.

did.unittitle: Transcript of Proceedings of the Emergency Board (no.70): Firemen's Diesel Case

scopecontent.p: Book I; volumes 1 to 29. Bound volume

did.unittitle: Transcript of Proceedings of the Emergency Board (no.70): Firemen's Diesel Case

scopecontent.p: Book II; volumes 30 to 41. Bound volume

did.unittitle: Report to the President by the Emergency Board (no.98)

scopecontent.p: February 14, 1952. To investigate a dispute between certain carriers under Federal management and certain of their employees represented by seventeen cooperating (nonoperative) railway labor organizations. Bound volume.
October Term, 1920, in 254, 255, 256 U.S. Bound volume.

did.unittitle: Seventeenth Annual Report of the National Mediation Board

scopecontent.p: For the Fiscal Year Ended June 30, 1951. Bound volume.

did.unittitle: Airline Labor Policy, The Stepchild of the Railway Labor Act
Letter from Frank P. Douglas to Esther Lewis (wife of Grady Lewis)

scopecontent.p: Biography of Grady Lewis written by William F. Semple and Winnie Lewis Gravitt. Photocopied from "Chronicles of Oklahoma."
Monograph on New York City's Grand Central Station, written by David Marshall.
